name: You can't beat this game
description:
"You can't beat this game" is a short but challenging 2D platformer, collect all coins and beat the 15 levels!

Controls:
A+D or left arrow and right arrow = Walking
Space = Jump
ctrl + f = Fullscreen
R = restart Level

Alt left = Next track
T = Mute music
Q = Sound increase
W = Sound decrease

Big thanks to "Kevin Macleod" wo made the music I use, you are the best!
